metadata.synopsis: One-liner for a Bhaal Cultist hiding in plain sight in the Park. Dialog should only trigger if a player manages to sneak in to the ambush area. Combat will start after this dialog plays.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Go invisible and sneak in to the back of the Park and speak to the Hooded Figure there. Coords CTY_Main_A -98, 29, -19

0.speaker: Sinister Hooded Man
0.text: Got you right where we want you. FOR OUR LORD BHAAL!

1.speaker: Sinister Hooded Man
1.text: Lady Orin preserves you for our Lord Bhaal's service. Serve him well.
